<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/security/access"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets the security settings to the modules with the IDs specified in the request.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

</Heading>

>
  
</RequestSchema>
